name: Git Sentry
description: Watch git repositories for changes to specific paths and get notified on Slack.

SENTRY_PATTERNS.description: Regex patterns describing paths in repositories to watch, in JSON format

SLACK_CHANNEL.description: Slack channel to post notifications to

SLACK_USERNAME.description: Username to post notifications as, defaults to 'GitSentry'

SLACK_ICON.description: Icon for Slack bot posting notifications, can be emoji or URL to image, defaults to :warning:
